body:
```
$ spack checksum nco
==> Found 5 versions of nco
  4.6.2     https://github.com/nco/nco/archive/4.6.2.tar.gz
  04        https://github.com/nco/nco/archive/4.6.3-alpha04.tar.gz
  03        https://github.com/nco/nco/archive/4.6.2-beta03.tar.gz
  02        https://github.com/nco/nco/archive/4.6.3-alpha02.tar.gz
  01        https://github.com/nco/nco/archive/4.6.2-beta01.tar.gz
```
Looks like we need to add another regex for this URL scheme. I would expect the alpha/beta versions to look like `4.6.3-alpha04` instead of `04`.
title: NCO versions not being detected properly
